translation.vi: Miss Miller, if you want to comewith me, I'll walk you home.

translation.en: Dave! Dave! We've got some great news!
translation.vi: Dave! Dave!We've got some great news!

translation.en: This letter just came from the DNA testing site.
translation.vi: This letter just camefrom the DNA testing site.

translation.en: It seems that they mixed up the lab results.
translation.vi: It seems that they mixed upthe lab results.

translation.en: Yeah! Bocarter isn't a king any more!
translation.vi: Yeah!Bocarter isn't a king any more!

translation.en: And you're not related to Jack the Dipper!
translation.vi: And you're not relatedto Jack the Dipper!

translation.en: Uh, no, Alvin. It's Jack The Ripper.
translation.vi: Uh, no, Alvin.It's Jack The Ripper.

translation.en: But, Theodore, I already knew I wasn't.
translation.vi: But, Theodore,I already knew I wasn't.

translation.en: Anyway, Dave, you know, they say in the letter
translation.vi: Anyway, Dave, you know,they say in the letter

translation.en: You don't have to be boring David Seville any more!
translation.vi: You don't have to beboring David Seville any more!

translation.en: But you could be related to the mother of dragons!
translation.vi: But you could be relatedto the mother of dragons!

translation.en: Alvin, seriously! Just stop it!
translation.vi: Alvin, seriously!Just stop it!

translation.en: -Please, reconsider! -[Dave] Alvin!
translation.vi: -Please, reconsider!-[Dave] Alvin!
